name: MSCRMExportSolution
description: Exports a CRM Solution from the source CRM environment
author: Wael Hamze

inputs.name: crmConnectionString
inputs.label: CRM Connection String
inputs.helpMarkDown: For more information on format: https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-gb/library/mt608573.aspx

inputs.name: solutionName
inputs.label: Solution Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The unique name of the solution you want to export

inputs.name: exportManaged
inputs.label: Export Managed
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set true to export the managed solution

inputs.name: exportUnmanaged
inputs.label: Export Unmanaged
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set true to export the unmanaged solution

inputs.name: targetVersion
inputs.label: Target Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Check task help for more information

inputs.name: updateVersion
inputs.label: Update Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sets the solution version in the source environment to the build number. build number format must end with '_x.x.x.x' e.g. '$(BuildDefinitionName)_5.0.0$(Rev:.r)'

inputs.name: includeVersionInSolutionFile
inputs.label: Include Version in Filename
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set to true to include the version number in the generated solution file name

inputs.name: outputPath
inputs.label: Output Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path on the agent machine where you want the solutions to be placed

inputs.name: crmConnectionTimeout
inputs.label: Crm Connection Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Crm connection timeout in seconds
